ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(RecordType.Name = 'Sales Help Request Case', ISPICKVAL(Type,'WalkMe'), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'NSS Manager Admin')), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'Sales Enablement')), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, 'System Admin')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please work with the Sales Effectiveness Manager for your division to submit this request.
